name: ILP#2-Justin-Barry
description:
Welcome to CIRCUIT BREAK!

------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY:

Click anywhere on the screen to move. 

Find the computer chip as fast as you can, in the least possible movements! 

Your robot can pass through the laser walls, but only a few times before it 

breaks down; Use this to your advantage!

NOTE: Fullscreen mode appears to break certain parts of the project. This is, apparently, a known issue with the WebGL builder that we're asked to use. Additionally, despite making the game in the requested resolution of 960 x 540, the embed cuts off corners, likely due to the bar at the bottom taking up room. Due to this, I had to extend the screen size so that it could fit everything (960 x 580). 

------------------------------------------------------

ASSETS USED:

Title and end screen backgrounds

-https://wallpapersafari.com/w/bgpYsQ

Music

Sound Effects

-all sounds are from "Touhou Eiyashou ~ Imperishable Night" by Jun'ya Ota
